meanings.definition: To offer a higher price than someone else in order to purchase something.
meanings.sent1: She always outbids others at auctions.
meanings.sent2: He outbids his competitors to win the auction.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky bidder outbids everyone at the last second.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outbids others is like a fierce bidding war.
meanings.sent5: The way she outbids everyone makes her the auction queen.

meanings.definition: To surpass in bidding for something.
meanings.sent1: The enthusiastic buyer outbids all his friends in the auction.
meanings.sent2: She always outbids her siblings in friendly competitions.
meanings.sent3: The cat outbids the dog for the last piece of fish.
meanings.sent4: His passion for collecting rare items outbids all others.
meanings.sent5: The way he outbids everyone shows his determination to win.
